location.name: Syria
location.activity-description: Provide TB medication to target groups

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: The incidence rate The treatment success rate The notification rate # of TB-MDR detected cases The mortality rate

baseline.comment: The incidence rate of 17 per100000 population - 2013 The treatment success rate of 84% - 2011 The notification rate of 12 per 100000 population - 2013 7 TB-MDR detected cases quarterly - 2013 The mortality rate 2.1 per 100000 - 2013

target.comment: Reach the incidence rate of 17per 100000 population Reach the treatment success rate of 90% Reach the notification rate 12 per 100000 Maintain the case detection of the TB-MDR patients to 7 per quarter Reach the mortality rate of 1.4 per 100000

actual.comment: As per Global Tuberculosis Report 2015 by WHO: The incidence rate is 17per 100000 population The treatment success rate is 80% The notification rate is 19 per 100000 The case detection rate of the TB-MDR patients to 31 in 2014 The mortality rate is <0.1 per 100000

location.name: Syria
location.activity-description: Provide medication to PLWH

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: # of studies among most at risk population( MARPS )successfully conducted and results distributed to stakeholders # of Adults and Children currently receiving Anti Retroviral Therapy..

baseline.comment: 0 studies among most at risk population( MARPS ) 137 Adults and Children currently receiving Anti Retroviral Therapy

target.comment: 152 of Adults and Children continue to receive Anti Retroviral Therapy. Piloting services for the prevention of Mother-To-Child Transmission (PMTCT) in three Governorates 100% of Donated Blood units screened for HIV in a quality-assured manner.

actual.comment: 141 of Adults and Children continue to receive Anti Retroviral Therapy. Piloting services for the prevention of Mother-To-Child Transmission (PMTCT) in four health centers in three Governorates 100% of Donated Blood units are screened for HIV in a quality-assured manner.

location.name: Tartus
location.activity-description: Provide emergency employment for affected population through solid waste removal and infrastructure rehabilitation

location.name: Homs
location.activity-description: Provide emergency employment for affected population through solid waste removal and infrastructure rehabilitation

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: # of jobs created (worker month) # of neighborhoods where support to the restoration of solid waste management SWM has led to improved service level # of tools, necessary equipment provided to local actors (for sustainability and continuity of the action) Tons of solid waste removed Liters of pesticides used # of indirect beneficiaries benefiting from improved health and environmental living conditions and repaired infrastructure

baseline.comment: Deteriorated basic social services and basic and community infrastructure

target.comment: 12,750 emergency job created 63,750 direct beneficiaries reached 75 neighborhoods targeted 90,000 tons of solid waste removed 250 KM of water network rehabilitated 900,275 indirect beneficiaries benefiting from better living standards

actual.comment: 13,349 emergency job created 80,191 direct beneficiaries reached 169 neighborhood targeted 198,335 tons of solid waste removed 250 KM of water network rehabilitated 1,712,299 indirect beneficiaries benefiting from better living standards

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: # of people with disabilities receiving disability aids # of people with disabilities receiving rehabilitation treatment # of rehabilitation sessions provided to people with disabilities # of people with disabilities receiving vocational training # of prosthetics production workshops established or rehabilitated # of psycho social support centers established # of people with disabilities reviving productive assets and startup tool kits

baseline.comment: Increased vulnerability of people with disabilities Increased demand for specific skills training for persons with disability

target.comment: 300 PWD’s receiving vocational training 2 prosthetics and mobility aids production workshops established or supported 1700 mobility aid device provided for PWD’s 500 rehabilitation sessions conducted for PWD’s 60 PWD’s benefiting from rehabilitation sessions 2 psycho social support centers established

actual.comment: 170 PWD received vocational training 2 prosthetics and mobility aids production workshops established 2126 mobility aid device provided for PWD’s 7498 rehabilitation sessions conducted for PWD’s 467 PWD’s benefiting from rehabilitation sessions 1 psycho social support centers established

iati-activity.title: Supp to Social Cohesion
iati-activity.description: livelihoods and community resilience initiatives.

country-budget-items.budget-item: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - disaster prevention and preparedness

transaction.disbursement-channel: Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account
Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account
Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account
Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account
Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: # of CBOs and NGOs receiving specialized capacity development and training # of NGOs receiving grants to implement local level initiatives # of youth involved in nature of inter and intra-communal activities focusing on social cohesion and community resilience through different entry points

baseline.comment: Loss of livelihood capitals (human, financial, social, physical, natural) Limited CBOs’ capacity to respond to the current unrest in the country and respond to the needs of the affected population Limited local level social cohesion and community resilience activities

target.comment: Capacity assessment conducted for the capacities of 50 NGOs conducted Three manuals to be prepared on ER&L, NGO management and project cycle management At least 70 NGOs and CBOs trained on livelihoods and early recovery concepts including social cohesion and community resilience. At least 6 NGOs receiving grants to implement local level social cohesion and community resilience initiatives. Piloting the implementation of twinning programme between NGOs/CBOs. 4 peer-to-peer network, Workshops, and Meetings in three governorates conducted Drama therapy, Sport for Peace, Music and Art for Peace, Food for Peace initiatives implemented in the four target governorates

actual.comment: Capacity assessment of 50 NGOs/CBOs conducted Three manuals on ER&L, NGO management and project cycle management prepared. 140 70 NGOs and CBOs trained on livelihoods and early recovery concepts including social cohesion and community resilience. 15 NGOs/CBOs received grants to implement local level social cohesion and community resilience initiatives. 4 peer-to-peer network, Workshops, and Meetings in three governorates conducted. Drama therapy, Sport for Peace, Music and Art for Peace, Food for Peace initiatives implemented in the five target governorates
